com.dsi.ant.chip

Class ChipProviderMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dsi.ant.chip.ChipProviderMetaData

  • public class ChipProviderMetaData
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the values that will match the meta-data information defined in the Android Manifest of any ANT Chip Provider Service. This signals to the ANT Radio Service that this Service is available to provide ANT Chips, plus what sort of IPC interface it should use to communicate, and the hardware type of the ANT Chip that can be detected/handled.

    • Field Detail

      • ANT_SERVICE_INFO_REQUEST

        public static final java.lang.String ANT_SERVICE_INFO_REQUEST
        The Intent that any service providing an ANT hardware interface will listen for.
        Used with PackageManager.queryIntentServices(). Using the GET_META_DATA flag will retrieve meta-data containing details for how to connect to the service and what the service does.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANT_CHIP_SERVICE_INTERFACE_TYPE_TAG

        public static final java.lang.String ANT_CHIP_SERVICE_INTERFACE_TYPE_TAG
        The android:name entry in a meta-data element for adapter type. Specifies the IPC type the ANT Radio Service must use to communicate with the service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANT_HARDWARE_TYPE_TAG

        public static final java.lang.String ANT_HARDWARE_TYPE_TAG
        If a service specified its adapter type as ANT_CHIP_SERVICE_INTERFACE_TYPE_REMOTE it must also include this key. The value should be a ANT_HARDWARE_TYPE_XXX constant specifying the type of connection to a chip this service uses. If no relevant value exists, a new string may be used, but this should be added to the ANT Radio Service ASAP.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANT_CHIP_SERVICE_INTERFACE_TYPE_REMOTE

        public static final java.lang.String ANT_CHIP_SERVICE_INTERFACE_TYPE_REMOTE
        This service provides a generic interface to a remote service that controls some type of ANT hardware. If this type is used "ANT_HardwareType" must also be defined.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
